sections.title: Information Collection
sections.content: We collect email, age, state, and gameplay data.

sections.title: Data Usage
sections.content: Data used to provide service and improve experience.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We use encryption and security measures.

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.content: We don't share data with third parties.

sections.title: User Rights
sections.content: You can request data access or deletion.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: Data retained as long as account active.
